mapper.sql: SELECT T.IMAGE_NAME, COUNT(*) TRADE_TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN T.OCR_STATUS = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OCR_TOTAL, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN T.OCR_STATUS = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(*)*100,2)||'%' OCR_RATE, SUM(CASE WHEN T.TICK_STATUS = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) TICK_TOTAL, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN T.TICK_STATUS = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(*)*100,2)||'%' TICK_RATE , SUM(CASE WHEN T.PLAT_STATUS = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) PLAT_TOTAL, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN T.PLAT_STATUS = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(*)*100,2)||'%' PLAT_RATE FROM OCR_TRADE T
mapper.select:
and T.IMAGE_NAME = #{imageName}
AND T.OCR_DATE >= to_date(#{params.beginTime},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND T.OCR_DATE <= to_date(#{params.endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd')
GROUP BY T.IMAGE_NAME
